text:

Sent:03/03/2024 at 05:25 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/04/2024 at 06:48 AM)
Subject:Re: Hardware Questions <not urgent>
Message 1819 of 4024
Good Morning,
In the quiet moments following this weekend's tensions, I've found myself deeply reflecting on usâ€”not just in the context of our family, but as two
individuals who've shared a life together. This period of separation has prompted me to appreciate the magnitude of what we've achieved over the
years. Despite our differences, perhaps even our incompatibilities, we've built something truly significant, and it shows in our kids. It's a testament to
our efforts, my deep respect for you, and what we've tried to accomplish together.
Perhaps later than you, I realize that we are far more different as human beings than I knew before- on so many levels. I believe neither of us was ready
for what we dove headlong into on "Ashbury beach picture day" with a belief we could will our way through, with best intentions, ignoring our own
baggage from our pasts. Our commitment to making marriage work was remarkable in itself. Whether driven by love, duty, or the sheer desire to
uphold our vows, what we did was real, challenging, and worthy of recognition.
I don't want another long message, instead, I'll simply express my hope for a future where we can sit down together, acknowledging the good times
and the tough, with a focus on moving forward. In a future where we appreciate our efforts without judgment, we understand that we may not have
been fully prepared for the challenges we faced, but we recognize the sincerity of our attempts. I'll be the first to admit that I wish I had the wisdom
you have now, back then, and made an effort to change sooner. Hindsight is 20/20.
I acknowledge your efforts are coming from a place you believe is best. But I hope you will open up to a shared perspective from someone who has
lessons of his own from the past he wants to share from also.
I'm here if you need anything. And I mean that. Have a great day.
-robert
Sent:03/04/2024 at 05:42 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/04/2024 at 06:48 AM)
Subject:Hoping for a Good Week
Message 1820 of 4024
